sourceMeaningMnemonic: The <radical>warehouse</radical> radical and the <kanji>warehouse</kanji> kanji are the same!
readingMnemonic: You have a <kanji>warehouse</kanji> to store all of your <reading>sou</reading>ls (<ja>そう</ja>). When people or animals you know pass away, you take their souls and store them in your dry warehouse for safekeeping. It's a public service, really.
readingInfo: Imagine if you kept a bunch of souls in a warehouse. This way they can't haunt anyone. And they can't get lost out in the spirit world. The warehouse is best for them.
